mapper.sql: id, examPageId, questionId, title, answers, hardLevelId, score, minTime, maxTime, accuracy, createTime, updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into exam_page_questions (examPageId, questionId, title, answers, hardLevelId, score, minTime, maxTime, accuracy) values (#{examPageId}, #{questionId}, #{title}, #{answers}, #{hardLevelId}, #{score}, #{minTime}, #{maxTime}, #{accuracy})

insert.foreach: insert into exam_page_questions (examPageId, questionId, title, answers, hardLevelId, score, minTime, maxTime, accuracy) values (#{item.examPageId}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.title}, #{item.answers}, #{item.hardLevelId}, #{item.score}, #{item.minTime}, #{item.maxTime}, #{item.accuracy})
